author: Al_Wood
title: This was a nice surprise!
review:
Only recently have I added Star Wars minifigures to my collection after my son decided he wanted to sell those that he had. 

When I saw the Lego Star Wars magazine in a local shop I decided to take a chance and buy it in the hope that the figure within the packet on the front was one that I did not already own.

On my return to the house I opened the packet and started assembling the figure. A nice representation of a Snowtrooper, white helmet with black eye holes, dark tan hands, blaster, printed torso and legs, as seen on the front of the packet. To my surprise the head piece was a female and so I knew straight away I did not have this figure. Once assembled I really did like the look of it and now it sits in my collection with my other Snowtroopers.

I believe that the minifigure is actually SW1178 so for the price of the magazine was a good find for me and a bargain.
